thread.title: Novak Djokovic’s standout year continues with title in Shanghai
thread.title_full: Novak Djokovic’s standout year continues with title in Shanghai

title: Novak Djokovic’s standout year continues with title in Shanghai
text: Novak Djokovic’s standout year continues with title in Shanghai Sunday, 18 October 2015 (30 seconds ago) Novak Djokovic brushed aside the challenge of a befuddled Jo-WIlfred Tsonga 6-1 6-4 to claim his third Shanghai Masters. Sania Mirza and Martina Hingis' magical moment continues. The Indian and the Swiss duo won its 8th title of the year, the 4th in a row after clinching China Open. Recent related news Novak Djokovic claimed his ninth title of the year with a 6-2 6-4 victory over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the Shanghai Masters final. Sporting Life 47 minutes ago - Sports Also reported by • MyNorthwest.com You Might Like
